description: This file defines a logging utility class 'Log' for managing and outputting informational, warning, error, and documentation issues during software processing. It includes methods for logging messages with different severity levels, handling output formatting, and maintaining logs related to parsing files.

classes.name: Log
classes.description: A logging class for managing informational, warning, error, and documentation issue messages with configurable output options based on verbosity and severity.

methods.name: __init__(self, name, verbose = False, warnings = True, doc_issues = False)
methods.description: Constructor initializing log settings, severity display options, and color codes based on the operating system.

methods.name: __Print(self, text, file="")
methods.description: Internal method to print a message to standard output.

methods.name: Info(self, text, file="")
methods.description: Logs an informational message if verbose output is enabled.

methods.name: InfoLine(self, obj, text, file="")
methods.description: Logs an informational message with specific file and line context, attempting to extract this information from the provided object.

methods.name: DocIssue(self, text, file="")
methods.description: Logs a documentation issue message if such logging is enabled.

methods.name: Warn(self, text, file="")
methods.description: Logs a warning message if warnings are enabled.

methods.name: WarnLine(self, obj, text, file="")
methods.description: Logs a warning with specific file and line context, extracting details from the provided object.

methods.name: Print(self, text, file="")
methods.description: Prints a general message to the standard output.

methods.name: Dump(self)
methods.description: Outputs all accumulated errors, warnings, and info messages.

methods.name: Header(self, text)
methods.description: Marks the start of processing for a specific file, setting context for log entries.

methods.name: Ellipsis(self,text, front=True)
methods.description: Shortens a given text to a maximum of 32 characters, adding ellipsis either at the start or end.

methods.name: Success(self, text)
methods.description: Logs a success message indicating completion of an operation.

ctags.name: __init__
ctags.pattern: /^    def __init__(self, name, verbose = False, warnings = True, doc_issues = False):$/
ctags.signature: (self, name, verbose = False, warnings = True, doc_issues = False)
